title: He Is A Devil
body:
He Is A Devil

"You fu*ker, why you are not showing that cocky look now?"

Everyone was looking at the screen with their jaw wide open.

The scene was just... Too cruel.

'Are we dreaming?' everyone was thinking the same thing.

Seeing a D+ rank hunter brutally beating down a C+ rank monster made them doubt their eyes.

Even though they saw many hunters killing high-level monsters than them, they never saw a D+ rank hunter killing a C+ rank hunter this easily.

"What the hell is wrong with this fellow?" Wyatt who was laughing a moment ago after seeing Evan get played by an ape was looking at the screen with a dumbfounded expression.

No one answer him because everyone was also stunned seeing this.

-// +50 points //-

After looking at the message in front of him Evan finally stopped beating down the ape.

Seeing the completely disfigured face of the ape Evan didn't even blink and stood up.
